contents.text:
Student email: student@example.com
Study plan:
{"rationale":"The milestones build sequentially: start with AI agent basics and language integration (team hands-on), establish application lifecycle practices, and then progressively deepen skills in DevOps, solutions management, lifecycle strategy, and automation. More challenging modules are spaced apart and reinforced with reviews before new topics. The distribution ensures steady progress without overload, with time built in for hands-on work and periodic consolidation to support real project readiness.","planTitle":"Create an AI Agent: Microsoft Copilot Studio & Azure AI Focused Study Plan","durationWeeks":8,"weeklyHours":6,"weeklyMilestones":[{"weekNumber":1,"objective":"Gain foundational knowledge of AI agents and setup environment.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Read introduction sections of the Copilot Studio and Azure AI modules.","Note AI agent concepts and key tools."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Explore Microsoft Copilot Studio interface in a demo or test environment.","Summarize capabilities pertinent to AI agent creation."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Review Azure AI services overview; watch a short video demo if possible.","Begin notes on integration between Copilot Studio and Azure AI."]}],"checkpoint":"Environment set up for Copilot Studio and Azure AI; basic understanding articulated in a summary."},{"weekNumber":2,"objective":"Hands-on: Integrate Azure AI Services into Copilot Studio agents.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Work through the 'Use Azure AI Services for Language in a Microsoft Copilot Studio' module up to initial setup and connection steps."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Continue module, focusing on defining intents and triggers in a Copilot Studio bot."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Deploy a test AI agent; experiment with language understanding features.","Troubleshoot common issues using module guidance."]}],"checkpoint":"Successfully complete and interact with a Copilot Studio agent that uses Azure AI language services."},{"weekNumber":3,"objective":"Grasp core application lifecycle management for Power Platform.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Begin Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) learning path (first module): read and take notes on main principles."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Continue with lifecycle management basics—focus on developing and deploying changes."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Apply lifecycle concepts to your AI agent project (plan dev/test/prod mapping)."]}],"checkpoint":"Document a basic workflow for your agent’s lifecycle and environments."},{"weekNumber":4,"objective":"Explore solutions management on Power Platform for scalable AI agent projects.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Complete the module 'Introduction to solutions for Microsoft Power Platform'."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Apply solution packaging to your AI agent (create a solution, add components)."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":30,"tasks":["Review and test transporting a solution between environments."]}],"checkpoint":"AI agent and any customizations packaged in a Power Platform solution and transferred between sandbox environments."},{"weekNumber":5,"objective":"Deepen lifecycle management strategies for production-readiness.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Begin the 'Plan application lifecycle management for Power Platform' module (architect series)."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Continue architectural considerations (environments, deployment strategies, security relevance)."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":30,"tasks":["Sketch a strategic lifecycle plan for your agent covering dev to prod."]}],"checkpoint":"A draft strategic lifecycle plan/map for your AI agent solution, aligning best practices."},{"weekNumber":6,"objective":"Learn DevOps essentials for robust AI agent delivery.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Start 'Introduction to DevOps' module; understand continuous integration and delivery."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Relate DevOps principles to Power Platform and AI agent projects via examples."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Draft a DevOps adoption roadmap for your own AI project."]}],"checkpoint":"A concise DevOps plan linked to your AI agent’s lifecycle; module quiz/passed section as proof."},{"weekNumber":7,"objective":"Apply automation with GitHub Actions for Power Platform solutions.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Begin 'Introduction to GitHub Actions' module and set up a demo repository."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Implement a basic CI/CD workflow for solution deployment with GitHub Actions."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":30,"tasks":["Test automation flows and troubleshoot errors."]}],"checkpoint":"Working example of GitHub Actions automating part of your solution’s deployment pipeline."},{"weekNumber":8,"objective":"Consolidate, review, and prepare for real-world/practice assessment.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":90,"tasks":["Review all module notes and project artifacts; list key learnings and remaining gaps."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Simulate lifecycle: update agent, repackage, redeploy with automation; fix any issues."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":30,"tasks":["Reflect on progress and outline actionable next steps (e.g. pursuing certification, building a portfolio, or launching a pilot use case)."]}],"checkpoint":"End-to-end working demo/prototype; readiness evaluation. Next steps documented."}],"briefMessageToUser":"This plan guides you from foundational skills to hands-on deployment of AI agents using Microsoft Copilot Studio and Azure AI, with a strong focus on lifecycle and DevOps. Stick with it each week—consistency leads to technical confidence and real-world capability. By the end, you’ll be capable of building, managing, and scaling modern AI agents with best practices. Good luck!"}

Produce JSON only matching the provided schema

{"rationale":"Reminders are tightly mapped to each session of the sequential AI agent study plan, ensuring the student stays engaged, makes consistent progress, and leverages official Microsoft resources at every stage. Milestones align with real-world competence and certification readiness, with motivational nudges reinforcing focus and completion.","recipientEmail":"student@example.com","reminders":[{"schedule":"2024-07-01T09:00:00","subject":"Kick Off: Learn the Basics of Copilot Studio & Azure AI","body":"Start your journey strong by reading the introduction sections of the Copilot Studio and Azure AI modules. Take notes on key AI agent concepts and the tools you'll be working with!","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/introduction-microsoft-copilot-studio/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-03T09:00:00","subject":"Explore Copilot Studio's Interface Hands-on","body":"Dive into the Copilot Studio interface today—try the demo environment and summarize the capabilities that matter for your future AI agents.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/introduction-microsoft-copilot-studio/2-explore-environment"},{"schedule":"2024-07-05T09:00:00","subject":"Review Azure AI Services Overview","body":"Continue building your foundation—review the Azure AI services overview and watch a quick demo to understand integration pathways with Copilot Studio.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/overview/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-08T09:00:00","subject":"Hands-on Integration: Start Using Azure AI Services","body":"Work through the 'Use Azure AI Services for Language in a Microsoft Copilot Studio' module up to the initial setup and connection—get hands-on and see your agent take shape!","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/use-azure-ai-services-language-microsoft-copilot-studio/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-10T09:00:00","subject":"Define Intents & Triggers in Copilot Studio","body":"Focus on refining your Copilot Studio bot by defining intents and triggers—this step is key to boosting your agent's intelligence!","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/use-azure-ai-services-language-microsoft-copilot-studio/4-intents-triggers"},{"schedule":"2024-07-12T09:00:00","subject":"Test, Deploy, and Troubleshoot Your First AI Agent","body":"Deploy your test AI agent and experiment with language features. Use the module to troubleshoot any issues for a smooth integration.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/use-azure-ai-services-language-microsoft-copilot-studio/6-troubleshoot"},{"schedule":"2024-07-15T09:00:00","subject":"Master Application Lifecycle Management Basics","body":"Begin your journey into Application Lifecycle Management: read the first module and note down the main lifecycle management principles.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/application-lifecycle-management-power-platform/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-17T09:00:00","subject":"Continue Your Power Platform Lifecycle Studies","body":"Expand your knowledge on developing and deploying changes in the Power Platform—these steps are essential for robust agent management.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/application-lifecycle-management-power-platform/3-introduction-lifecycle-management/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-19T09:00:00","subject":"Apply Lifecycle Concepts to Your Project","body":"Now, directly plan how you’ll map dev, test, and prod environments for your AI agent—set yourself up for scalable success.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/application-lifecycle-management-power-platform/4-planning-environments/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-22T09:00:00","subject":"Solutions Management: Module Deep Dive","body":"Complete the 'Introduction to solutions for Microsoft Power Platform' module and see how solution management empowers scalable AI projects.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/introduction-solutions-microsoft-power-platform/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-24T09:00:00","subject":"Practice Solution Packaging for Your AI Agent","body":"Apply solution packaging to your agent—create a solution and add its components for organized deployment.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/introduction-solutions-microsoft-power-platform/4-create-solution/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-26T09:00:00","subject":"Transport Solutions Between Environments","body":"Test transporting your packaged solution between environments—this skill is vital for professional team workflows.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/power-platform/alm/solution-based-application-lifecycle-management"},{"schedule":"2024-07-29T09:00:00","subject":"Strategize Lifecycle Management at Scale","body":"Jump into the 'Plan application lifecycle management for Power Platform' architect module, and get strategic with your approach.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/plan-application-lifecycle-management-power-platform/"},{"schedule":"2024-07-31T09:00:00","subject":"Deepen Lifecycle Architecture for AI Agents","body":"Continue refining your architecture—focus on environments, deployment strategies, and security for production-quality agents.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/plan-application-lifecycle-management-power-platform/3-architectural-choices/"},{"schedule":"2024-08-02T09:00:00","subject":"Draft Your Agent's Strategic Lifecycle Map","body":"Sketch your strategic lifecycle plan, mapping every step from dev to prod in line with best practices.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/plan-application-lifecycle-management-power-platform/5-lifecycle-practices/"},{"schedule":"2024-08-05T09:00:00","subject":"Kick Off DevOps for AI Agents","body":"Start the 'Introduction to DevOps' module—cement your understanding of CI/CD to enable robust, automated agent delivery.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/introduction-devops/"},{"schedule":"2024-08-07T09:00:00","subject":"Connect DevOps to Power Platform Projects","body":"Relate DevOps principles directly to your Power Platform and AI projects with hands-on examples for real-world relevance.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/introduction-devops/4-devops-practices/"},{"schedule":"2024-08-09T09:00:00","subject":"Map a DevOps Roadmap for Your Solution","body":"Draft your DevOps adoption plan—outline CI/CD for your AI agent’s lifecycle and complete the module quiz for validation.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/introduction-devops/7-knowledge-check/"},{"schedule":"2024-08-12T09:00:00","subject":"Automate with GitHub Actions: Get Started","body":"Begin the 'Introduction to GitHub Actions' module and set up your demo repository to automate your agent deployments!","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/introduction-github-actions/"},{"schedule":"2024-08-14T09:00:00","subject":"Build Your First CI/CD Pipeline with GitHub Actions","body":"Implement your first CI/CD workflow—this is where DevOps comes to life for your Power Platform solutions.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/introduction-github-actions/4-build-workflow/"},{"schedule":"2024-08-16T09:00:00","subject":"Test and Improve Automation Flows","body":"Test and troubleshoot your GitHub Actions automation flows, ensuring smooth and reliable deployments.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/modules/introduction-github-actions/6-troubleshoot-flows/"},{"schedule":"2024-08-19T09:00:00","subject":"Consolidate Your Learning: Review and Reflect","body":"Review your module notes and project work—identify key learnings and any gaps to fill before assessment.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/paths/create-intelligent-bots-with-microsoft-copilot-studio/"},{"schedule":"2024-08-21T09:00:00","subject":"Lifecycle Simulation: Practice Real-World Updates","body":"Simulate a full lifecycle update: package, deploy, automate—and fix any snags! This boosts your real-world readiness.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/training/paths/create-intelligent-bots-with-microsoft-copilot-studio/"},{"schedule":"2024-08-23T09:00:00","subject":"Reflect and Plan Your Next Steps","body":"Celebrate your progress! Reflect, outline next actions for certification or project launch, and prepare for future success in AI.","link":"https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/certifications/"}],"motivationMessages":[{"schedule":"2024-07-05T12:00:00","body":"You’ve finished your first week! Small steps each day create long-term skills. Stay confident—you are building a valuable foundation."},{"schedule":"2024-07-19T12:00:00","body":"You’ve hit the halfway point! Keep pushing forward—every session brings you closer to being an AI agent expert."},{"schedule":"2024-08-02T18:00:00","body":"Another milestone reached—great work! Use your strategic plan as a blueprint for future projects and real-world scenarios."},{"schedule":"2024-08-16T18:00:00","body":"Automation mastery unlocked! Your skills are ready for the next level—keep this consistency as you wrap up your study plan."},{"schedule":"2024-08-23T17:00:00","body":"You made it to the finish! Consider next steps like certification or a portfolio project—your journey with Microsoft AI is just beginning."}],"briefMessageToUser":"Your study schedule is designed for steady, achievable progress toward Microsoft Copilot Studio and Azure AI mastery—regular session reminders, paired with the right resources, will keep you on track. Keep up the momentum and celebrate your commitment each week!"}
